column5: Its sad because I have so many people who I could talk to about my problems but Im afraid to. I'm afraid to kill the mood by telling people I want to die. Im afraid they will think Im joking or being over dramatic. And in the long run, it makes me feel that much lonelier to know I cannot be comfortable with anyone enough to tell them the truth.

What always helps me is to listen to the stories of suicide attempt surivivors. Almost always, they say that half way through they didnt want to die anymore. Its not a permanent solution by any means, and it never takes the thought of suicide from my mind. But it helps me put it off one day at a time.
